mapper.select: select user_id, email, password, join_time, username, avatar_url, gender, simple_desc, position, industry, career, education, full_desc, liked_count, collected_count, follow_count, followed_count, scanned_count FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, username, email, password) values(#{userId}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password});
